resources.string: Congratulations, you got a high score !
Current game is up! Will you like to start a new game ?
Tap on empty holes to pace a peg. Tap the lock button when complete
Custom board is setup, you can start playing. Note that high scores for custom boards are not recorded
Move a peg to an available hole in a straight line jumping over another peg
The peg jumped over is removed
Try to remove as many pegs as possible
Getting only 1 peg remaining is the goal
This will cancel the current board. Do you want to proceed ?
No more moves are possible. Game is up !
Solver has computed the moves that lead to a minimum number of pegs.\n\nUse the Forward button to see the board moves.

Solver has computed the moves that lead to a minimum number of pegs. Since this is a free version, the solver can find a solution leading to a minimum of 3 pegs only. In the paid version the solver can find a solution with 1 peg.\n\nUse the Forward button to see the board moves.

Depending on the current board, the Solver may take a few seconds to several minutes in computing a solution with least number of pegs. Since the Solver does a lot of computations, it will deplete battery power. It is advised that you put your phone on charge before starting the solver. While running the Solver can be stopped at any time and latest peg result will be available.
Cannot play game in solver mode. Select New Game to start a new game
Current board is set to Standard, do you want to change to French board ?
Current board is set to French, do you want to change to Standard board ?
